A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The plot\, direction\, spirit and humor in this movie did not align with the Star Wars universe and was generally bad.  The entire casino plot was meaningless and distracting.  Snoke's demise just seemed lazy.  Though Mark Hamil's portrayal of Luke was excellent the Luke character did not seem believable or consistent.  The humor in this movie seemed out of t place and though I occasionally laughed\, I didn't feel like it fit the movie.  This is not a robo review\, just a disappoint fan of all but one of the Star Wars movies.
